name: Yume, Shosen Mousou
summary: Yume, Shosen Mousou is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Kamitsuki, who not only refuses to leave their room, but blocks the door. It plays like most fangames, the main objective being to collect all 22 effects to unlock the ending. Also, this game has no background music, although sound effects are fully present.
